menu.text: Enter 1 to list all users that are following you.
Enter 2 to list all users that you're following.
Enter 3 to follow all users with their username saved in a JSON or CSV (Auth token required).
Enter 4 to unfollow everyone that you follows (Auth token required).
Enter 5 to follow only who is following you (Auth token required).
Enter 6 to make a backup of your followers in a CSV/JSON.
Enter 7 to make a backup of users that follows you in a CSV/JSON

listing_following: Listing all users that you are following.

pagination_menu.text: Enter 1 to go to the next page.
Enter 2 to go to previewer page.

save_options.text: Enter 1 to save to a CSV.
Enter 2 to save to a JSON.

initial_conf_text: The following configurations will be prompted once and stored in resources/configs.json
